name: Back and Forward Button
author: Tawhidur Rahman Dear

sections.description:
Add ◄ and ► button anywhere in website matching theme color and style. Alternative of Previous and Next page

  • Mobile Responsive
  • No need to translate, as it shows “◄” and “►” only
  • The Plugin takes very low space in hosting
  • The Plugin will automatically match with your Theme’s color, button, style. Visitor will think it as the part of your theme. If you use this Plugin in different themes, you will feel the change
  • Easy Installation! After activation of the Plugin, Simply go to Appearance > Widgets, and drag the Plugin into any widgetized area like sidebar or footer
  • No coding knowledge or expertise required! You will not have to use any short-code or to edit settings
  • Freedom! If you use any Page Builder, then you can add inside page or post also

Live Preview

https://store.devilhunter.net/wordpress-plugin/back-and-forward-button

If you are browsing from laptop, then you will see “◄” and “►” button at left side navigation bar; and if you are browsing from mobile or tab, then you will see “◄” and “►” button at top-left hamburger menu. Remember, the preview will be different at different themes as the Plugin automatically match with Theme’s color, font, style

Hire for Web Development

If you are looking for freelancer to build your website, then you can buy any of these offers : Small Business website, Newspaper or Magazine website, eCommerce website from UpWork. You may also convert your website into app.

Are you happy?

You are requested to provide positive review in WordPress.org with some extra clicks to share this Plugin in your social network

Caution!

WordPress is now promoting Block-editing. This Plugin works with WordPress latest version, but only with non-block Theme. You may need to install Restore Classic Widgets or Classic Widgets Plugin. Both are free.

󠀠󠀠󠀠󠀠

Thank you

Tawhidur Rahman Dear

  • Dear IT Solution : IT Consultancy, Web and App Development, AdSense, SEO, Graphic Design, Password Recovery and Security, Online Marketing, Corporate Services
  • Dear Store : WordPress Plugin, JavaScript, CSS Code, Blogger Theme, Desktop Software for Windows

sections.installation: Download this free WordPress.org Plugin, and read this image-based article “How to install WordPress Plugin, and use it in sidebar or footer or inside page or post?” and start using the Plugin
sections.reviews:
Fatal Error

By vladimir (lomomir) on September 21, 2023

Fatal error after install. Cant activate the plugin.

Very convenient plugin

By MIL (mil33) on July 7, 2022

Thank you, a very convenient and necessary plugin

Excellent solution for PWA !!

By ikihinojosa on July 12, 2021

Same as your Bread Crumb based on URL plugin... this one is amazing... I was having hard time to go back to previous pages on the buddy press and bbpress plugins, but this solve the problems in a very nice and easy way... the main problem was by using the PWA app, which they dont allow to show the brouser back and forth buttons so Thanks a lot!!!!

Browser buttons

By ELR3000 on March 5, 2017

it works just like browser back buttons
